name: Game a Week 01_Gravity Puzzler
description:
Feel free to leave comments and feedback. Critique is very appreciated!Read Postmortem--Synopsis--

A gravity based puzzle game in which you guide a block through a series of tubes while avoiding dead ends. This was my first game created for the game a week challenge and is not in a completed state.

--Known Issues--

-Third(final) stage cannot be completed making game unwinnable

--Controls--

Alt + Left Click: Rotate

Alt + Middle Mouse Button: Pan

Alt + Right Click: Zoom

Left Click on Blocks: Changes Blocks Attributes

Left Click on Teleporter Pads: Sets Teleporter Entrance

Right Click on Teleporter Pads: Sets Teleporter Exits

--Contact Me--

Email: nichoreynolds@gmail.com

Blog: https://touchmyhapticfeedback.wordpress.com
